name: Iffy Institute
description: Iffy Institute is a fast-paced maze action game for 2-4 players, in which the five most high-profile lab animals fight for survival in a mad scientists lab. Build explosion chains with powerful directional bombs and roast your enemies with super-mighty special skills.
minimum_requirements: 最低配置: 操作系统: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1 or Windows 10 处理器: Intel Core I3 - 4th Generation or similar 内存: 4 GB RAM 图形: Nvidia Geforce GTX 660 or similar 存储空间: 需要 300 MB 可用空间 声卡: yes, please
recommended_requirements: 推荐配置: 操作系统: Windows 10 处理器: Core i7 or similar 内存: 8 GB RAM 图形: Nvidia Geforce GTX 760 or similar 存储空间: 需要 300 MB 可用空间 声卡: needed
